about.title: OUR SPA
about.description: Hedra Spa is a sanctuary for wellness and relaxation where your body and mind find balance.
about.mainText: Enjoy our personalized treatments, from therapeutic massages to facial and body care, in a calm and welcoming environment. Our goal is to provide you with a deep relaxation experience that renews your energy and vitality.
about.secondaryText: Come and discover your Hedra moment! ðŸŒ¿

services.title: SPA SERVICES
services.description: Here you will find our spa services described

therapeutic.title: Body Treatments
therapeutic.description: Our therapeutic massages help to relax muscles, relieve stress, and improve circulation.

subServices.title: Body Harmony
subServices.description: Indulge in a ritual of serenity where gentle Swedish techniques dissolve tension and renew vital energy. Warm, deep-penetrating obsidian stones awaken circulation, while aromatherapy and essential oils caress the skin, immersing you in a state of total harmony.

subServices.title: Active Revitalization
subServices.description: Enjoy a combination of restorative techniques designed for active individuals. Relax with a cranial massage that stimulates circulation. The treatment continues with gentle stretching and deep movements, restoring the body's balance and releasing tension from fatigued muscles.

subServices.title: Customized Equilibrium
subServices.description: A wellness journey intuitively created with your therapist, where every technique is tailored to your energetic and physical needs. You will relieve tension and stress in specific areas while your entire body is harmonized, awakening a profound sense of balance, relaxation, and inner renewal.

subServices.title: Connection Ritual
subServices.description: Allow yourself to be enveloped in a journey of calm and harmony. Conscious breathing paves the way to serenity, while an aromatic massage with warm oils awakens the senses and renews your energy. A warm wrap seals the experience, melding body and soul into a deep sensation of inner peace.

subServices.title: Vital Balance
subServices.description: Begin your experience with a refreshing cleanse and exfoliation that awakens and revitalizes your feet. Continue with a nourishing and therapeutic massage, accompanied by work on specific points, which releases built-up tension and restores the balance of body and energy. This ritual connects your feet to the earth, providing a profound sense of well-being, lightness, and integral harmony.

subServices.title: Sanctuary of Harmony
subServices.description: Immerse yourselves in a shared serenity experience with a 60-minute massage that harmonizes body and mind. Then, enjoy an intimate and cozy space with strawberries and a glass of Prosecco, where calm and connection flow naturally. Conclude with a jacuzzi bath that renews your energy and celebrates your union.

subServices.title: Inner Glow
subServices.description: Begin your journey to inner harmony with conscious breathing that awakens the senses and balances your energy. A full-body massage relaxes every muscle and prepares the skin for a gentle exfoliation that renews and revitalizes. The experience culminates with a soothing hydrating massage that seals in luminosity, wrapping you in a sensation of well-being and profound serenity.

subServices.title: Silken Aura
subServices.description: Immerse yourself in a ritual of renewal that nourishes your skin and your energy. It begins with a delicate facial that awakens your natural luminosity and balances facial vitality, followed by a relaxing Swedish massage that releases tension, activates circulation, and harmonizes body and mind. A deep exfoliation eliminates impurities and reveals soft, luminous, and purified skin, leaving a delicate 'bridal veil' effect that symbolizes freshness and purity. The ritual culminates with a nourishing body wrap that tones, reduces inflammation, and softens lines and spots, promoting deep well-being, inner serenity, and a feeling of integral renewal that embraces body, mind, and spirit.

signature.title: Signature Collection
signature.description: Exclusive experience of premium treatments inspired by ancient rituals and modern techniques.

subServices.title: Deep Nourishment
subServices.description: A deep awakening for the skin and energy. Hydrating serums and delicate massages nourish every layer, leaving your face revitalized, luminous, and in total harmony.

subServices.title: Facial Elixir
subServices.description: A deep relaxation ritual that infuses the skin. We use a selection of elite serums and masks to regenerate and bestow an incomparable glow upon your face.

subServices.title: Jade Gua Sha
subServices.description: A Gua Sha massage that infuses energy and calm. Specific formulas and premium masks balance every layer of the skin, leaving the face profoundly harmonized, refreshed, and radiant.

facial.title: Facial Treatments
facial.description: Care for your skin with natural products and professional techniques that restore its radiance.

subServices.title: Deep Nourishment
subServices.description: A deep awakening for the skin and energy. Hydrating serums and delicate massages nourish every layer, leaving your face revitalized, luminous, and in total harmony.

subServices.title: Jade Gua Sha
subServices.description: A Gua Sha massage that infuses energy and calm. Specific formulas and premium masks balance every layer of the skin, leaving the face profoundly harmonized, refreshed, and radiant.

wellness.title: Wellness Rituals
wellness.description: Immerse yourself in a sensory experience that combines aromatherapy, music, and relaxation techniques.

subServices.title: Hot Stone Therapy
subServices.description: Combination of massage and heat for deep relaxation and pain relief.

subServices.title: Sea Salt Exfoliation
subServices.description: Removes dead cells, leaving skin soft and renewed.

technology.title: Body Rituals
technology.text: Every session is more than a massage; it's a ritual designed to release deep tension. Choose exclusive relaxation therapies, guided by expert hands, for total well-being.

locations.title: The Art of Skin
locations.text: Our facial rituals go beyond the superficial. We achieve deep hydration and a flawless texture that feels as vital as it looks.

medical.title: Flow in Calmness
medical.text: Immerse yourself in the warm embrace of our jacuzzi. Designed to relax your muscles and clear your mind, marking the perfect start or close to your experience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to help. Send us a message and we'll get back to you shortly.
